variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 0.00% on the portion of income up to $3,560. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 3.00% on the portion of income over $3,560 up to $17,830. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 6.20% on the portion of income over $17,830. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_3 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all three brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
